  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WiaDeviceType
    The WiaDeviceType enumeration specifies the type of device attached to a user's computer.
    WiaEventFlag
    A DeviceEvent's type is composed of bits from the WiaEventFlags enumeration.
    WiaImageBias
    The WiaImageBias enumeration helps specify what type of data the image is intended to represent.
    WiaImageIntent
    The WiaImageIntent enumeration helps specify what type of data the image is intended to represent.
    WiaImagePropertyType
    The WiaImagePropertyType enumeration specifies the type of the value of an image property.
    WiaItemFlag
    An Item's type is composed of bits from the WiaItemFlags enumeration.
    WiaPropertyType
    The WiaPropertyType enumeration specifies the type of the value of an item property.
    WiaSubType
    The WiaSubType enumeration specifies more detail about the property value.
